item.description: My article on server side rendering originally published on Meural's Product Blog. item.title: From Philosophy to Computer Science
item.description: When I say that I’m a software developer with a background in academic philosophy, many people react with surprise, as if I had jumped between completely divergent fields. Philosophy and computer science are in fact closely related and it is easy to transition from one to the other. In this article I would like to highlight a few reasons why this is so, with the hopes of dispelling the common misperception that they are opposites and of giving some background for students of philosophy who are interested...

item.title: SkiFree
item.description: Here's a clone of the classic game SkiFree that I made with Javascript Canvas as part of a/A's curriculum. Check out the repo on GitHub here. Click to begin and use the mouse to control your skier. #canvas { display: block; border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 6px; width: 500px; height: 500px; background-image: url('/assets/ski-free-background.png'); background-size: contain; } @media screen and (max-width: 500px) { #canvas { width: 100%; } }
